name: floatpower
description: Raises the given value to the power of the exponent.

params_body.name: value
params_body.description: The value to raise to a power, as a floating-point number.

params_body.name: exponent
params_body.description: The exponent is also a floating-point number. It may be zero or negative.

return_values: The result of 'value' to the power of 'exponent'.
pawn_code:
printf("2 to the power of 8 is %f", floatpower(2.0, 8.0));
// Result: 256.0
related_fn:
floatsqroot: Calculate the square root of a floating point value.
 floatlog: Get the logarithm of the float value.
